title: Fishing in the Rain
subtle: Fantasy (fiction), 454 words, Level K (Grade 2), Lexile 490L, Fiction Series
description: Even though it rains and rains, the Hoppers set out on a fishing and camping trip with Grandpa Grizzly. The Hoppers begin to cough and sneeze, but before they head back into the tent, Snubby Nose takes a spill into the river! Grandpa Grizzly dives into the water and retrieves Snubby Nose, his fishing pole, and a special surprise.
highFrequencyWords: bending, comfortable, fishing poles, hook, marshmallows, wriggling
